data.name: 浮生箓2：九九行歌 Floating Life 2
data.detailed_description:
官方媒体





About the Game

The gods fall, the demons disappear, and the people reign over all living beings forever.

One hundred years of turmoil in the world, all sides of the scorched earth suddenly appeared in the long ladder of god. There are high people outside the world, into the mountain for fairy road, countryside and many different people, Baicao lian elixir, Penglai old news continued new, dare to laugh we don't become fairy?

On the top of the mountain, there are human ancestors looking up at the stars, to see the secrets of heaven and earth; Inside the cave, there is a Taoist monk lian gas base, to cross the bridge fairy ladder; Outside the land, there are also descendants of ancient gods and demons ready to move, intent to reproduce the primordial legend.

Heaven and earth changes, such as piao ping.

Above the sacred tree, red clouds cover the sky, golden aconite falls to the ground, god turtle rises out of the water, heaven and earth will change, the fate of unknown.

What track will the child of destiny, chosen by providence, carve in this ever-healing realm of the immortal?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A compact plot + rich branches + massive random events

We set out to create a story that would really tug at the heartstrings. Not only did we iterate over and over the main story, but we also extended many branches of the story along the light and dark lines for players to explore. In addition, we have a lot of linear or open-ended random events that make kyushu interesting or... Bad taste.



Two, rich knead face and opening background

We can choose a different appearance and origin for each opening. You can choose to be a scion of xiuxian family at the start of the starting line catapult, or you can be a nameless poor kid, in the self-set track to challenge yourself.



Three, the dynamic change of the fairy world + more rich and lively NPC interaction

In our vision, NPCS should be more than just poor tool people, providing the player with low-level items and unproductive dialogue. We try to make NPCS more alive, they have a unique life trajectory, and they have adventures in their own stories. If you accidentally piss them off, you're going to end up in a bad situation, and of course you can have a good fight, as long as your friends list is long enough.

You are in this fairy world is no longer indifferent to your love, you in the game made every big movement will be someone behind you point, right and wrong to choose their own, every step you walk will leave corresponding footprints in this fantasy world.



Four or five large gate + rich family background

Five different styles of Xiuxian Zong gate will open to you as the process of the game, you can learn different skills, through free combination and collocation, so that each battle has a different wonderful. Of course, handsome men and beautiful women are also indispensable, in addition to becoming strong, you can also meet the personality of the NPC, and even some of them become a Taoist partner, hand in hand into the path of immortality.

In the game, players can not only worship each large gate, but also live in the gate through their own efforts to rise. From the outer gate the disciple will be promoted to the grand elder. Different positions not only different salary, but also unlock different zong Door play. If the boring collection makes you tired, it is better to spend some lingshi to let the following disciples to help you implement it. Welcome to join the big gate and start your career in the world of spiritual enlightenment.




The rich secular world

Beyond the celestial road, the mundane land is equally wonderful. Large and small villages and towns have many interactive buildings, from serious "inn", "tavern", "auction house" to less serious "stone gambling workshop", "brothel" and so on, for the vast number of players in the practice of free exploration, fine taste.

data.short_description: Floating Life2 is a sandbox fairy quest where you interact with NPCS in real time and experience the ups and downs of fairy quest together. Join xiuxian Zong Gate, experience the rich adventure map and real-time combat, gradually discover the truth of the earth and earth changes, change your fate.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64位或以上
  • Processor: Intel Core i3或以上
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Grahics Series
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080或同比例分辨率
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64位或以上
  • Processor: Intel Core i5或以上
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520或以上
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080或同比例分辨率
